sourcesContent:
export const MESSAGES = {
  // Success messages
  EXPENSE_ADDED: 'Expense added successfully',
  EXPENSE_UPDATED: 'Expense updated successfully',
  EXPENSE_DELETED: 'Expense deleted successfully',
  PAYMENT_RECORDED: 'Payment recorded successfully',
  GROUP_CREATED: 'Group created successfully',
  GROUP_UPDATED: 'Group updated successfully',
  
  // Error messages
  ERROR_GENERIC: 'Something went wrong. Please try again.',
  ERROR_REQUIRED_FIELD: 'This field is required',
  ERROR_INVALID_AMOUNT: 'Please enter a valid amount',
  ERROR_INVALID_SPLIT: 'Split amounts must equal the total',
  ERROR_NO_MEMBERS: 'Please select at least one member',
  
  // Info messages
  NO_EXPENSES: 'No expenses yet',
  NO_GROUPS: 'No groups yet. Create one to get started!',
  NO_BALANCE: 'All settled up!',
  
  // Confirmation messages
  CONFIRM_DELETE_EXPENSE: 'Are you sure you want to delete this expense?',
  CONFIRM_DELETE_GROUP: 'Are you sure you want to delete this group?',
  
  // Placeholders
  PLACEHOLDER_DESCRIPTION: 'Enter description',
  PLACEHOLDER_AMOUNT: 'Enter amount',
  PLACEHOLDER_GROUP_NAME: 'Enter group name',
  PLACEHOLDER_SEARCH: 'Search...',
};

export const LABELS = {
  AMOUNT: 'Amount',
  DESCRIPTION: 'Description',
  PAID_BY: 'Paid by',
  SPLIT_BETWEEN: 'Split between',
  DATE: 'Date',
  GROUP: 'Group',
  CATEGORY: 'Category',
  YOU_OWE: 'You owe',
  OWES_YOU: 'owes you',
  SETTLE_UP: 'Settle up',
  ADD_EXPENSE: 'Add expense',
  SAVE: 'Save',
  CANCEL: 'Cancel',
  DELETE: 'Delete',
  EDIT: 'Edit',
  BACK: 'Back',
  DASHBOARD: 'Dashboard',
  ALL_EXPENSES: 'All expenses',
  GROUPS: 'Groups',
  SETTINGS: 'Settings',
};
